tuv.seg: { $actionType }<playIcon></playIcon> did they accurately speak the sentence?
{ $actionType }<playIcon></playIcon> Ei la construcziun vegnida prelegida correctamein?
{ $actionType }<recordIcon></recordIcon> lura preleger la construcziun dad ault
Add an avatar clip to your profile
Aschunta ina registraziun d'avatar a tiu profil.
Add an avatar to your profile
Aschuntar in avatar a tiu profil

All voice clips in the dataset are scrubbed of personally identifying information. When a contributor provides demographic data via their profile, that information is de-identified from their voice clips before being bundled for download in the dataset and is never made public on their profile page.

Da tut las registraziuns ell'unitad da datas vegnan las informaziuns d'identificaziun persunala allontanadas. Sch'in cooperatur metta a disposiziun datas demograficas en siu profil, vegnan quellas informaziuns allontanadas da sias registraziuns avon ch'ellas vegnan messas a disposiziun sco unitad da datas per telecargar; plinavon vegnan ellas mai publicadas sin sia pagina da profil.

Anonymized user data like age, sex, and accent helps improve the audio data used to train the accuracy of speech recognition engines. Your username and email will never be associated with your submitted data, and you can choose whether to make your username public or anonymous.

Datas d'utilisaders anonimisadas, p.ex. la vegliadetgna, schlatteina ed igl accent, augmentan la qualitad dallas datas da tun che vegnan duvradas per trenar l'exactadad da maschinas da reconuschientscha vocala. Tiu num d'utilisader e tia adressa dad e-mail vegnan mai messas en in connex cun las datas che ti has inoltrau e ti sas decider, sche tiu num d'utilisader duei esser publics ni anonims.
A voice clip is marked "valid" when a user gives it a Yes vote.
Ina registraziun vocala ei marcada sco "valeivla", sch'in utilisader valetescha ella cun in Gie.
<bold>iOS</bold> users can download our free app:
Utilisaders dad <bold>iOS</bold> san telecargar nossa app gratuitamein:

Both of these projects are part of our efforts to bridge the digital speech divide. Voice recognition technologies bring a human dimension to our devices, but developers need an enormous amount of voice data to build them. Currently, most of that data is expensive and proprietary. We want to make voice data freely and publicly available, and make sure the data represents the diversity of real people. Together we can make voice recognition better for everyone.

Omisdus projects fan part da nos sforzs da surmuntar il cunfin da lungatg digital. Las tecnologias d'identificaziun dalla vusch dattan a nos apparats ina dimensiun humana, mo ils sviluppaders drovan ina massa datas da lungatg discurriu per crear ellas. Actualmein ei la gronda part da quellas datas cara e protegida culs dretgs d'autur. Nus lein metter a disposiziun datas da lungatg a moda libra e publica e garantir che las datas representien la diversitad dallas persunas realas. Ensemen savein nus migliurar l'identificaziun da lungatg per tuts.
Why an email? We may need to contact you in the future about changes to the dataset, an email provides us a point of contact.
Pertgei duvreis vus in'adressa dad e-mail? Probablamein stuein nus informar tei el futur davart midadas ell'unitad da datas. In'adressa dad e-mail dat a nus la pusseivladad da contactar tei.
By editing your goal, you may lose your existing progress.
Sche ti modificheschas tia finamira, sa ei esser che ti piardas tiu progress existent.
By opting in to receive emails you state that you are okay with Mozilla handling this info as explained in Mozilla’s <privacyLink>Privacy Policy<privacyLink>.
Cun dar il consentiment da retscheiver e-mails acceptas ti che Mozilla tracta quellas informaziuns sco explicau ellas <privacyLink>directivas davart la protecziun da datas<privacyLink> da Mozilla.
You agree to not attempt to determine the identity of speakers in the Common Voice dataset
Ti acceptas da buca empruar d'eruir l'identitad dils plidaders dall'unitad da datas da Common Voice.
By providing some information about yourself, the audio data you submit to Common Voice will be more useful to Speech Recognition engines that use this data to improve their accuracy.
Sche ti indicheschas enzacontas informaziuns davart tetez/tetezza, gidan las datas da tun che ti inoltreschas en Common Voice las maschinas da reconuschientscha vocala ad augmentar lur exactadad.
By using Common Voice, you agree to our <termsLink>Terms</termsLink> and <privacyLink>Privacy Notice</privacyLink>
Cun duvrar Common Voice acceptas ti nossas <termsLink>cundiziuns d'utilisaziun</termsLink> e nossas<privacyLink>directivas davart la protecziun da datas</privacyLink>
Change your email via Settings under Login Identity
Ti sas midar tia adressa dad e-mail en Parameters sut Identitad d'annunzia
Collecting sentences from the public domain, or writing new ones for the public domain.
Rimnar construcziuns dalla domena publica ni scriver novas per la domena publica.
Common Voice data plus all other voice datasets above.
Datas da Common Voice e tut las autras datas da lungatg numnadas sura.
Unitad da datas da Common Voice

Common Voice is a collaborative project, and we're depending on our community of partners and contributors to build the largest open-source dataset of voices ever.
We would like to thank the following people and organizations for their help with the project:

Common Voice ei in project collaborativ. Nus essan dependents da nossa communitad da partenaris e cooperaturs per crear la pli gronda unitad da datas vocalas open source.
Nus engraziein allas suandontas persunas ed organisaziuns per lur agid en connex cul project:
Common Voice is Mozilla's initiative to help teach machines how real people speak.
Common Voice ei l'iniziativa da Mozilla per gidar a mussar a maschinas co persunas realas discuoran.
Common Voice is part of Mozilla's initiative to help teach machines how real people speak.
Common Voice fa part dall'iniziativa da Mozilla da mussar a maschinas co carstgauns reals discuoran.

Common Voice is part of Mozilla's initiative to help teach machines how real people speak. In addition to the Common Voice dataset, we’re also building an open source speech recognition engine called Deep Speech.

Common Voice fa part dall'iniziativa da Mozilla per gidar maschinas ad emprender co carstgauns reals discuoran. Ultra da Common Voice sviluppein nus era ina maschina open source cul num Deep Speech che distingua lungatgs.

Common Voice recordings are used by academics, small businesses, and voice recognition enthusiasts to help train and grow publicly available resources like voice models.
Can you let us know why you would like your recordings deleted?

Las registraziuns da Common Voice vegnan duvradas d'academichers, d'interpresas pintgas e d'entusiasts per l'identificaziun da vusch che gidan a trenar e cumpletar resursas accessiblas publicamein, sco models da lungatg discurriu.
Sas ti explicar a nus daco che ti vul stizzar tias registraziuns?
Content available under a <licenseLink>Creative Commons license</licenseLink>
Il cuntegn stat a disposiziun sut ina <licenseLink>licenzia da Creative Commons</licenseLink>
Contributors record voice clips by reading from a bank of donated sentences.
Ils contribuiders registreschan lur vusch cun preleger construcziuns contribuidas en ina banca da datas.
Create a custom voice wave to introduce yourself. Other users will be able to hover and listen to your clip.
Ti sas crear ina registraziun persunalisada per sepresentar. Auters utilisaders san ir suravi culla miur e tedlar tiu clip.
Create a voice clip as part of your profile avatar. Others will be able to hover and listen to your clip.
Creescha in clip da vusch sco part da tiu profil d'avatar. Aschia san ils auters tedlar tiu clip.
Don't see your language on Common Voice yet?
Ei tiu lungatg aunc buca veseivels sin Common Voice?
Don’t see your language reflected in the Dataset? To request a language head over to our Languages page.
Maunca tiu lungatg aunc ell'unitad da datas? Per tschercar in lungatg, viseta nossa Pagina da lungatgs.
Telecargar l'unitad da datas da Common Voice
Do you have ideas on how we can make the Common Voice dataset better? Let us know on Discourse
Has ti propostas co meglierar l'unitad da datas da Common Voice? Lura dai part sin Discourse
Do you want to Speak, Listen or both?
Vul ti discuorer, tedlar ni far omisdus?
During contribution submission feedback will be skipped after clicking 'Submit. Contribution will continue directly with the next set of 5 recordings or validations.
Duront contribuir vegn il resun sursiglius cura che ti smaccas 'tarmetter'. Lu suondan directamein las proximas 5 registraziuns ni confirmaziuns.

Each entry in the dataset consists of a unique MP3 and corresponding text file. Many of the { $total } recorded hours in the dataset also include demographic metadata like age, sex, and accent that can help train the accuracy of speech recognition engines. The dataset currently consists of { $valid } validated hours in { $languages } languages, but we’re always adding more voices and languages. Take a look at our Languages page to request a language or start contributing.

Mintga endataziun ell'unitad da datas consista d'in singul MP3 e d'ina datoteca da text corrispundenta. Biaras dallas { $total } uras registradas ell'unitad da datas cuntegnan era metadatas demograficas sco la vegliadetgna, la schlatteina ed igl accent, cun las qualas ins sa trenar l'exactadad da maschinas per identificar la vusch. L'unitad da datas consista actualmein da { $valid } uras confirmadas en { $languages } lungatgs, mo nus aschuntein adina dapli novas vuschs e novs lungatgs. Viseta nossa pagina da lungatgs per tschercar in lungatg ni per entscheiver a contribuir.
Email is already used for a different account
Quella adressa dad e-mail vegn gia duvrada per in auter conto
Endatescha tia adressa d'e-mail per iniziar il download
Vul ti finir la registraziun avon?

For these launched languages the website has been successfully <localizationGlossaryLink>localized</localizationGlossaryLink>, and has enough <sentenceCollectionGlossaryLink>sentences collected</sentenceCollectionGlossaryLink> to allow for ongoing <speakLink>Speak</speakLink> and <listenLink>Listen</listenLink> contributions.

Per ils suandonts lungatgs activs ei la pagina-web vegnida <localizationGlossaryLink>translatada</localizationGlossaryLink> cumpleinamein ed ei dat ina <sentenceCollectionGlossaryLink>collecziun da construcziuns</sentenceCollectionGlossaryLink> ch'ei gronda avunda per cuntinuar cun <speakLink>discuorer</speakLink> e <listenLink>tedlar</listenLink> contribuziuns.
Ils emprems pass a l'identificaziun vocala
Dai ina vusch a tiu avatar

Great! How many clips per day?
Great work!<playIcon></playIcon> Listen again when you're ready
Excellenta lavur!<playIcon></playIcon>Teidla danovamein, sche ti eis promts/promta.
Vul ti dar in resun a nus?
Have questions about Common Voice? Ideas for improvements or feedback about a specific language? Join us on our <discourseLink>Discourse forum</discourseLink> and let us know.
Has ti damondas davart Common Voice? Has ti ideas per meglieraziuns ni resuns davart in lungatg specific? Viseta nus sin nies <discourseLink>forum Discourse</discourseLink> e dai part.
Having a profile is not required to contribute though it is helpful, see why below.
Per contribuir eis ei buca necessari dad haver in profil, igl ei denton d'avantatg. Daco vesas ti sutvart.

Gida Common Voice a contonscher { NUMBER($hours) } uras en in lungatg cun ina finamira persunala

Gida a contonscher { NUMBER($hours) } uras en { $language } cun ina finamira persunala

Gida a mussar a maschinas co persunas realas discuoran, contribuescha cun tia vusch sin { $link }
Help us build a community around voice technology, stay in touch via email.
Gida nus a crear ina communitad interessada a tecnologias vocalas, resta en contact cun nus via e-mail.
Help us build a high quality, publicly open dataset
Gida nus a crear in'unitad da datas aviarta, publica e d'aulta qualitad
Help us find more voices, share your goal
Ti sas gidar nus ad anflar dapli vuschs, sche ti partas tias finamiras.
Help us find others to donate their voice!
Gida nus ad anflar autras persunas che contribueschan cun lur vusch!
Gida nus a validar las construcziuns!
Gida nus a validar las vuschs
How can I get the Common Voice data?
Co survegn jeu las datas da Common Voice?
How does Common Voice calculate hours?
Co calculescha Common Voice las uras?
How do you ensure anonymity and privacy of the people who donated their voices?
Co garantis vus l'anonimitad e la protecziun da datas dallas persunas che han contribuiu lur vusch?
I am a non-native speaker and I speak with an accent, do you still want my voice?
Jeu sun buc ina persuna da lungatg matern e discuorel cun accent. Essas vus tuttina interessai vid mia vusch?
I'd like to receive emails such as goal reminders, my progress updates and newsletters about Common Voice.
Jeu less retscheiver e-mails, per exempel regurdientschas da finamiras, mes rapports da progress e newsletters da Common Voice.
I just created a personal goal for voice donation to #CommonVoice -- join me and help teach machines how real people speak { $link }
Jeu hai gest creau ina finamira persunala per contribuir culla vusch a #CommonVoice -- fai il medem e gida a mussar a maschinas co persunas realas discuoran { $link }
I’m afraid I don’t know what you’re looking for.
Perstgisa, jeu sai buca tgei che ti enqueras.
I'm okay with you handling this info as you explain in Mozilla's <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink>
Jeu acceptel che vus tracteis quellas informaziuns sco vus declareis ellas <privacyLink>Directivas davart la protecziun da datas</privacyLink> da Mozilla.
Ein mias datas da conto publicas?
Is the goal of Common Voice to build a voice assistant?
Ei la finamira da Common Voice da crear in assistent vocal?
It contains words or phrases that are hard to read or pronounce.
Ella cuntegn plaids ni frasas ch'ein grevas da leger ni da pronunziar.
It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
Igl ei in fatg gia daditg enconuschent ch'in lectur sa buca seconcentrar sil cuntegn d'ina pagina, sch'el mira sil layout.
It is written in a language different than what I’m speaking.
La construcziun ei scretta en in auter lungatg che quel che jeu discuorel.
Join the Common Voice mailing list
S'annunzia per la gliesta dad e-mails da Common Voice
Stai vidlunder e fai aunc ina registraziun <recordIcon></recordIcon>

Mantegn la survesta davart tiu progress e tia statistica en differents lungatgs.

Teni en egl vies progress cun in profil
Keep track of your progress with a profile and help our voice data be more accurate.
Cun in profil tegns ti en egl tiu progress e fas che nossas datas daventan pli exactas.
Language request successfully submitted, thank you.
Ti has tarmess cun success ina damonda per in niev lungatg, engraziel fetg!
Leaving now means you’ll lose your changes
Sche ti bandunas ussa, piardas ti las midadas.
Leaving now means you'll lose your progress
Sche ti sortas ussa, piardas ti tiu progress.
LibriSpeech is a corpus of approximately 1000 hours of 16Khz read English speech derived from read audiobooks from the LibriVox project.
LibriSpeech ei in corpus da biabein 1000 uras da registraziuns prelegidas en lungatg engles (registradas en 16Khz) che derivan da cudischs auditivs e dil project LibriVox.
Log in or sign up to get started
Log In / Sign Up with { $company } email
s'annunziar / s'inscriver cun l'adressa dad e-mail da { $company }
Looks like there aren't any clips to listen to in this language. Help us fill the queue by recording some now.
Ei para dad haver negins clips da tedlar en quei lungatg. Sche ti registreschas ussa enzacons, gidas ti nus ad emplenir la retscha.
Make your submitted data as rich as possible by providing some anonymous demographic data. We de-identify all demographic data before making it public.

Las datas che ti inoltreschas survegnan dapli valeta, sche ti fas enzacontas indicaziuns demograficas anonimas. A basa dallas datas demograficas che nus publichein vegn ei denton buc ad esser pusseivel d'identificar tei.

Most of the data used by large companies isn’t available to the majority of people. We think that stifles innovation. So we’ve launched Common Voice, a project to help make voice recognition open and accessible to everyone.

La plipart dallas datas che grondas firmas nezegian stat buc a disposiziun alla maioritad dils carstgauns. Nus essan dil meini che quei stinschenti innovaziuns. Perquei havein nus lantschau Common Voice, in project che gida a render la reconuschientscha vocala aviarta ed accessibla a tuts.

Most of the data used by large companies isn’t available to the majority of people. We think that stifles innovation. So we’ve launched Project Common Voice, a project to help make voice recognition open to everyone.

La plipart dallas datas che grondas firmas nezegian stat buc a disposiziun alla maioritad dils carstgauns. Nus essan dil meini che quei stinschenti innovaziuns. Perquei havein nus lantschau Common Voice, in project che renda la reconuschientscha vocala accessibla a tuts.

Most speech databases are trained with an overrepresentation of certain demographics which results in a bias towards <articleLink>male and middle class</articleLink>. Accents and dialects that tend to be under-represented in training data sets are typically associated with groups of people who are already marginalised. Many machines also struggle to understand female voices. This is why in our voice database we want variety!

Las pliras bancas da datas da lungatg vegnan trenadas d'ina surrepresentanza da certas demografias. Quei meina ad ina favorisaziun <articleLink>d'umens e da participonts dalla classa da miez</articleLink>. Accents e dialects ch'ein tendenzialmein sutrepresentai en unitads da datas da trenament vegnan tipicamein mess en connex cun persunas ch'ein gia marginalisadas. Biaras maschinas han era breigias da capir vuschs femininas. Perquei lein nus varietad en nossa banca da datas da lungatg.

Mozilla doesn’t pick or favor any one language over another. Instead, Common Voice is a purely community-driven initiative, but it takes <multilangLink>several steps to add a new language</multilangLink> and begin collecting voice donations. First, the Common Voice website needs to be translated so community members can access the contributor experience in their own language. Next, we need a large collection of copyright-free sentences for people to read outloud. Once both of those requirements are satisfied a language is “launched” on Common Voice for people to start recording their voice and validating others donations. If you want to help launch a new language, head over to our <sentenceCollectorLink>sentence collection tool</sentenceCollectorLink> to get started.

Mozilla ni elegia ni favorisescha in lungatg ad in auter. Cuntrari, ei setracta tier Common Voice d'ina iniziativa che s'orientescha sulettamein alla communitad. Ei drova denton <multilangLink>plirs pass per integrar in niev lungatg</multilangLink> ed entscheiver a rimnar contribuziuns vocalas. Igl emprem sto la pagina d'internet da Common Voice vegnir translatada per ch'ils commembers dalla communitad sappien profitar dallas experienzas dils cooperaturs en lur agen lungatg. Sco proxim duvrein nus per preleger ina gronda collecziun da construcziuns ch'ein libras dils dretgs d'autur. Aschispert che omisduas premissas ein ademplidas, vegn in lungatg "lantschaus" sin Common Voice, aschia che la glieud sa registrar la vusch e confirmar las contribuziuns d'auters. Sche ti vul gidar a lantschar in niev lungatg, visetas ti nies <sentenceCollectorLink> utensil per rimnar construcziuns </sentenceCollectorLink>.

Mozilla is dedicated to keeping the web open and accessible for everyone. To do that we need to empower web creators through projects like Common Voice. As voice technologies proliferate beyond niche applications, we believe they must serve all users equally. That means investing in more languages and accommodating diverse accents and demographics when building and testing voice technologies. Common Voice is a public resource available to everyone and Mozilla teams and developers around the world are already using it on our own projects as well.

Mozilla ha la finamira da mantener la reit aviarta ed accessibla per mintgin. Perquei ston creaturs da cuntegn da web vegnir susteni cun projects sco Common Voice. Damai che las tecnologias da lungatg ein neginas applicaziuns da nischa pli, essan nus digl avis ch'ellas duein esser disponiblas a tuts a moda eguala. Quei munta investir en dapli lungatgs e risguardar differents accents e demografias duront il process da sviluppar ed examinar tecnologias vocalas. Common Voice ei ina resursa publica che stat a disposiziun a tuts e ch'ils teams da Mozilla e sviluppaders sigl entir mund drovan gia per ils agens projects.
Mycroft is the world’s first open source assistant. Mycroft runs anywhere - on a desktop computer, inside an automobile, or on a Raspberry Pi.
Mycroft ei igl emprem assistent digital open source dil mund. Mycroft funcziunescha dapertut - sin in computer, en in auto ni sin ina petta da puaunas (Raspberry Pi).
No gravatar found for your email
Anflau negins gravatars per tia adressa dad e-mail
Note: When set to 'Visible', this setting can be changed from the <profileLink>Profile page</profileLink>
Remarca: sche quei parameter ei sin 'mussar', sa el vegnir midaus silla pagina da <profileLink>profil</profileLink>
Note: You will still need to select between Speak or Listen to change contribution type.
Remarca: ti stos eleger Discuorer ni Tedlar per midar il tip da contribuziun.

Now you can donate your voice to help us build an open-source voice database that anyone can use to make innovative apps for devices and the web. Read a sentence to help machines learn how real people speak. Check the work of other contributors to improve the quality. It’s that simple!

Ussa sas ti contribuir cun tia vusch per gidar nus a sviluppar ina banca da datas open source cun vuschs, ina che mintgin sa duvrar per crear applicaziuns innovativas per apparats e pil web. Legia ina construcziun, per che maschinas sappien emprender co persunas realas disuoran. Controllescha la lavur che auters han contribuiu e meglierescha aschia la qualitad. Igl ei propi sempel!
{ NUMBER($totalHours) } hours is achievable in just over { NUMBER($periodMonths) } months if { NUMBER($people) } people record { NUMBER($clipsPerDay) } clips a day.
{ NUMBER($totalHours) } uras san vegnir contonschidas en mo { NUMBER($periodMonths) } meins, sche { NUMBER($people) } persunas registreschan { NUMBER($clipsPerDay) } clips per di.
On desktop computers, you can download the latest:
Sin computers da desktop sas ti telecargar la pli nova versiun:
Optionally join on our email list for updates and new information about the project.
Sche ti vul, sas ti s'inscriver en nossa gliesta per retscheiver e-mails cun novitads ed informaziuns davart il project.
Optionally submitted demographic data (e.g. age, sex, language, and accent) is de-identified from your submitted voice data and will never be made public on your profile.
Informaziuns demograficas facultativas (p. ex. vegliadetgna, schlatteina, lungatg ed accent) vegnan de-identificadas da tias datas da vusch tarmessas e vegnan mai publicadas sin tiu profil.
ni stizzar il clip da vusch

Our source text is made up of original contributor donations as well as dialogue from public domain movie scripts like <italic>It’s a Wonderful Life</italic>.
You can view our source sentences in this <githubLink>GitHub folder</githubLink>.

Nies text da fontauna consista da donaziuns originalas da cooperaturs sco era da dialogs da domenas publicas da scripts da film sco</italic>.
Vus saveis prender investa en nossas unitads da fontauna en quei <githubLink>ordinatur da GitHub</githubLink>.
Overall project status: see how far we’ve come!
Status general dil project: mira con lunsch che nus essan gia!
Press play, listen & tell us: did they accurately speak the sentence below?
Smacca Far ir, teidla e di a nus: vegn la suandonta construcziun pronunziada endretg?
Press { shortcut-play-toggle } to toggle play mode
Smacca { shortcut-play-toggle } per entscheiver a preleger ni per calar
Declaraziun davart la protecziun da datas
Profile information improves the audio data used in training speech recognition accuracy.
Las informaziuns dil profil augmentan la qualitad dallas datas da tun che vegnan duvradas per trenar l'exactadad dalla reconuschientscha vocala.
Read more on our About page
Legia dapli sin nossa pagina d'informaziuns davart Common Voice.
Eis promta/promts da contribuir tia vusch?
Eis ti promts/promta da gidar nus a valetar las construcziuns?
Receive emails such as challenge and goal reminders, progress updates, and newsletters about Common Voice.
Jeu less retscheiver e-mails, per exempel regurdientschas da finamiras, mes rapports da progress e newsletters da Common Voice.
Recording voice clips is an integral part of building our open dataset; some would say it's the fun part too.
Registrar clips da vuschs ei ina part integrala per crear nossa unitad da datas aviarta; biars schessen ch'ei seigi era la part divertenta.

Tuorna cheu per modificar tia finamira da tut temps.

Cumpareglia tiu progress cun las contribuziuns d'autras persunas digl entir mund.

Parta tia finamira da { $count } clips per di per { $type }

<speechBlogLink>Ils emprems pass per identificar la vusch</speechBlogLink>

Speech is often the most natural way we communicate with each other and voice technologies are bringing that convenience to our computers and mobile devices. We want to empower developers to build amazing voice recognition applications like real-time translators and voice-enabled digital assistants. But right now most of the voice data required to build these kinds of apps is expensive and proprietary. We hope the Common Voice dataset will give developers what they need to innovate and make speech technology available in their own language.
To make voice recognition even more universal, we're collecting voice samples in widely spoken languages as well as those with a smaller population of speakers often underserved by commercial speech recognition services. Publishing a diverse dataset of voices will empower developers, entrepreneurs, and entire speech communities to address this gap themselves.

Discuorer ei savens la moda e maniera la pli naturala da communicar in cun l'auter. Las tecnologias vocalas portan quei confort sin nos computers ed apparats mobils. Nus lein possibilitar als sviluppaders da crear applicaziuns da reconuschientscha vocala che fan smarvigliar, p.ex. per translatar en temps real ni assistents digitals che san discuorer. Pil mument ei denton la plipart dallas datas da vuschs ch'ei drova per far talas applicaziuns cara e protegida culs dretgs d'autur. Nus sperein che la collecziun da datas da Common Voice detti als sviluppaders quei ch'els drovan per far innovaziuns e per metter a disposiziun la tecnologia vocala en lur agen lungatg.
Per saver far diever dalla reconuschientscha vocala a moda pli universala rimnein nus registraziuns da vuschs en lungatgs derasai sco era lungatgs che vegnan discurri d'ina pli pintga populaziun e savens buca risguardai da survetschs commercials da reconuschientscha vocala. Cunquei che nus publichein ina collecziun varionta da datas cun vuschs han sviluppaders, interprendiders ed entiras communitads linguisticas la pusseivladad da serrar quella largia ord atgna forza.
Speech-to-text (STT) technologies convert voice data into text.
Tecnologias da vusch a text (STT) converteschan datotecas da lungatg en text.
Il profil ei vegnius creaus cun success!
Tatoeba is a large database of sentences, translations, and spoken audio for use in language learning. This download contains spoken English recorded by their community.
Tatoeba ei la pli gronda unitad da datas da construcziuns, translaziuns e lungatg discurriu pil diever d'emprender lungatgs. Quei download cuntegn engles discurriu registrau da sia communitad.
Thanks for confirming your account, now let's build your profile.
Engraziel fetg per confirmar tiu conto. Nus creein ussa tiu profil.
Thank you for recording!<lineBreak></lineBreak>Now review and submit your clips below.
Engraziel fetg per la registraziun!<lineBreak></lineBreak>Verifichescha e transmetta tia registraziun sutvart.

Thank you for your interest in contributing to { $lang }. We work hard to get every language ready for launch and keep the teams updated via email. If you want to contribute, please provide your email below.

Engraziel per tiu interess da contribuir a { $lang }. Nus dein tutta breigia da preparar mintga lungatg per saver lantschar el e da tener sil current ils teams per e-mail. Sche ti vul contribuir, sche indichescha tia adressa dad e-mail cheusut.
The Clip Graveyard consists of voice clips that didn't make it into the Common Voice dataset. Just like the dataset, the Clip Graveyard is available for download.

Il santeri da registraziuns consista da registraziuns vocalas ch'ein buca vegnidas integradas ell'unitad da datas. Sco l'unitad da datas stat era il santeri da registraziuns a disposiziun per telecargar.
The clip has disrespectful or offensive language.
Il clip ha in lungatg senza respect ni offendent.

The Common Voice dataset complements Mozilla’s open source voice recognition engine Deep Speech. The first version of Deep Speech was released in November 2017 and has continued to evolve ever since. Together with the Common Voice dataset, we believe this open source voice recognition technology should be available to everybody. It’s our hope these technologies will enable developers to build a wave of innovative products and services.

La collecziun da datas da Common Voice cumpletescha la maschina da reconuschientscha vocala open source da Mozilla Deep Search. L'emprema versiun da Deep Search ei vegnida publicada il november 2017 ed ei sesviluppada cuntinuadamein. Nus essan dil meini che quella tecnologia da reconuschientscha vocala, ensemen culla collecziun da datas da Common Voice, duei star a disposiziun a mintgin. Nossa speronza eis ei che quellas tecnologias possibiliteschien als sviluppaders da crear in'entira unda da products e survetschs innovativs.

The Common Voice dataset complements Mozilla’s open source voice recognition engine Deep Speech, which you can use to build speech recognition applications. Read our <githubLink>Github overview</githubLink> or join the <discourseLink>DeepSpeech Discourse</discourseLink> to learn how to get started.

L'unitad da datas da Common Voice cumpletescha la maschina d'identificaziun vocala open source Deep Speech da Mozilla, cun la quala ti sas sviluppar applicaziuns per l'identificaziun da lungatg. Legia nossa <githubLink>survesta sin Github</githubLink> ni entra ella <discourseLink>DeepSpeech Discourse</discourseLink> per emprender ils emprems pass.
The Common Voice Dataset contains hundreds of thousands of voice samples that help developers build voice recognition tools.
L'unitad da datas da Common Voice cuntegn tschiensmellis exempels da vuschs che gidan ils sviluppaders a crear utensils per identificar la vusch.

The Common Voice dataset is an open and publicly available resource that can be used to train a wide variety of speech-enabled applications. To protect the security of our contributors, we ask everyone who downloads the Common Voice dataset to respect contributors’ privacy.
All voice clips in the dataset are scrubbed of personally identifying information. When you download the dataset, you agree to not attempt to determine the identity of any contributor. That means you cannot try to link information in the dataset to a contributor’s personal information. You may, however, use the dataset to train speech recognition, speaker recognition, or other applications, by, for instance, linking information in the dataset to other information already in the dataset.

L'unitad da datas da Common Voice ei ina resursa aviarta ch'ei accessibla publicamein e cun la quala ins po trenar numerusas applicaziuns che vegnan dirigidas cul lungatg. Per proteger la segirtad da nos cooperaturs, supplichein nus mintgin che telecarga l'unitad da datas da Common Voice, da respectar la protecziun dalla sfera privata dils cooperaturs.
En tut las registraziuns dall'unitad da datas vegnan las informaziuns per l'identificaziun persunala allontanadas. Sche vus telecargheis las datas, consentis vus da buca eruir l'identitad dils cooperaturs. Quei munta che vus astgeis buc empruar da colligiar informaziuns dil mantun da datas cun informaziuns persunalas d'in cooperatur. Vus saveis denton duvrar l'unitad da datas per trenar l'identificaziun da lungatgs ni l'identificaziun da plidaders ni autras applicaziuns, per exempel cun colligiar informaziuns ell'unitad da datas cun autras informaziuns ch'ein gia ell'unitad da datas.

The Common Voice dataset is available for download under the <licenseLink>CC0</licenseLink> license on <datasetLink>our Datasets page</datasetLink>. You can also download several other publicly available datasets from the same page.

La collecziun da datas da Common Voice stat a disposiziun per telecargar sut la licenzia <licenseLink>CC0</licenseLink> sin <datasetLink>nossa pagina culla collecziun da datas</datasetLink>. Ti sas era telecargar diversas autras collecziuns da datas publicas dalla medema pagina.
The count of voice recording hours that have been validated by 2 out of 3 users with a vote of “Yes”. These mark progress toward the overall project 10k hours goal.
Il diember d'uras da registraziun ch'ein vegnidas valetadas da 2 da 3 utilisaders cun in "Gie". Quel marchescha il progress en vesta alla finamira da 10'000 uras.
The count of voice recording hours we have collected so far.
Il diember d'uras da registraziun rimnadas entochen ussa.

The goal of the Common Voice dataset is to enable anyone in the world to build speech recognition, speaker recognition, or any other type of application that requires voice data. A voice assistant is just one of many types of applications you could use the dataset to build.

La finamira dall'unitad da datas da Common Voice ei da porscher a tuts sin quest mund la pusseivladad da crear applicaziuns per l'identificaziun da vuschs, plidaders ni autras funcziuns che pretendan datas da lungatg. In assistent da lungatg ei mo ina da biaras sorts d'applicaziuns che vus saveis crear cull'unitad da datas.

The multi-language version of the Common Voice dataset is currently undergoing community supported bundling and cleaning. If you would like to help us bring Common Voice to new languages, go check out the <sentenceCollectorLink>Sentence Collection Tool</sentenceCollectorLink> for adding new sentences to the dataset, and Mozilla <pontoonLink>Pontoon</pontoonLink> for translating the website itself. New languages are added to Common Voice for voice contribution when 5000 approved sentences have been collected.

La versiun plurilingua da l'unitad da datas da Common Voice vegn actualmein repassada dalla communitad. Sche vus leis gidar nus ad aschuntar novs lungatgs a Common Voice, visitei il <sentenceCollectorLink>Sentence Collection Tool</sentenceCollectorLink> per aschuntar novas construcziuns all'unitad da datas, e Mozilla <pontoonLink>Pontoon</pontoonLink> per translatar la pagina-web sezza. Novs lungatgs vegnan aschuntai a Common Voice per la contribuziun vocala, aschispert che 5000 construcziuns approbadas ein avon maun.

The multi-language version of the Common Voice dataset is currently undergoing community supported bundling and cleaning. If you would like to learn more about supporting this effort, please <contactLink>contact us</contactLink>. We are currently targeting a publish date of January 2019. After that, we’ll update the dataset periodically with new languages and voice clips as they become available. An iterative release cycle cadence is still to be determined.

Tut il necessari per la versiun plurilinguala dalla collecziun da datas da Common Voice vegn actualmein rimnau e surluvrau cun agid dalla communitad. Sche ti vul saver dapli co ti sas sustener quei, sche <contactLink>contactescha nus</contactLink>. Nus sespruein actualmein da publicar il schaner 2019. Suenter vegnin nus ad aschuntar alla collecziun da datas periodicamein novs lungatgs e clips da vuschs, sco che quels stattan a disposiziun. Nus vegnin aunc a fixar tgei cadenza ch'il ciclus da publicaziuns vegn ad haver.
The number of recordings and which languages you contribute to will be public.
Il diember da tias registraziuns ed a tgei lungatgs che ti contribueschas vegnan publicai.
The process by which a contributor’s profile information is obscured from their donated voice clips when packaged for download as a part of the dataset.
Il process, cun il qual las informaziuns dil profil d'in cooperatur vegnan separadas da sias registraziuns contribuidas, cura ch'ellas vegnan preparadas sco part dall'unitad da datas per telecargar.
La registraziun ei memia da bass.

These languages are currently under community development. The progress bars indicate how far each language is in the process of <localizationGlossaryLink>website localization</localizationGlossaryLink> and <sentenceCollectionGlossaryLink>sentence collection</sentenceCollectionGlossaryLink>.

Quels lungatgs vegnan actualmein sviluppai dalla communitad. Las travs da progress indicheschan per mintga lungatg con lunsch che la <localizationGlossaryLink>translaziun dalla pagina-web</localizationGlossaryLink> e la <sentenceCollectionGlossaryLink>collecziun da construcziuns</sentenceCollectionGlossaryLink> ei vegnida realisada.
The selected file is too large
La datoteca che ti has eligiu ei memia gronda
The sentence has a grammatical or spelling error.
La construcziun ha in sbagl grammatical ni ortografic.
The sentence has disrespectful or offensive language.
La construcziun ha in lungatg senza respect ni offendent.
The TED-LIUM corpus was made from audio talks and their transcriptions available on the TED website.
Il corpus TED-LIUM ei vegnius realisaus cun registraziuns d'audio da referats e lur transcripziuns ch'ein disponiblas silla pagina-web TED.
This is approximately the number of hours required to train a production speech-to-text system.
Quei ei pressapauc il diember d'uras ch'ei da basegns per trenar in sistem productiv da speech-to-text.
This is open source software which can be freely remixed, extended, and improved. Mycroft may be used in anything from a science project to an enterprise software application.

Ei setracta d'in program open source che sa vegnir modificaus, extendius e meglieraus libramein. Mycroft sa vegnir duvraus en tut las spartas, seigi quei per projects scientifics ni programs per interpresas.
This is our process for translating and adapting our content for many locales (languages).
Quei ei nies process per translatar ed adattar nies cuntegn per bia lungatgs.

This setting controls your leaderboard visibility. When hidden, your progress will be private. This means your image, user name and progress will not appear on the leaderboard. Note that leaderboard refresh takes ~{ $minutes }min to populate changes.

Quei parameter influenzescha tia visibladad ella gliesta da rangaziun. Sch'el ei mess sin buca mussar, ei tiu progress privats. Quei vul dir che tiu maletg, num d'utilisader e progress ein buca veseivels ella gliesta da rangaziun. Remarca: midadas ella gliesta da rangaziun drovan ~{ $minutes }min entochen ch'ellas ein veseivlas.
Today's Common Voice progress on clips recorded
Il progress dallas registraziuns dad oz en Common Voice
Today's Common Voice progress on clips validated
Il progress dallas registraziuns valetadas oz en Common Voice
To make it into the Common Voice dataset, a voice clip must be validated by two separate users.
Per vegnir integrada ell'unitad da datas da Common Voice, sto ina registraziun vocala vegnir controllada da dus differents utilisaders.

To make the Common Voice dataset as useful as possible we have decided to only allow source text that is available under a Creative Commons (CC0) license. Using the CC0 standard means its more difficult to find and collect source text, but allows anyone to use the resulting voice data without usage restrictions or authorization from Mozilla. Ultimately, we want to make the multi-language dataset as useful as possible to everyone, including researchers, universities, startups, governments, social purpose organizations, and hobbyists.

Per crear l'unitad da datas da Common Voice a moda aschi nizeivla sco pusseivel essan nus sedecidi da lubir mo texts da fontauna ch'ein suttamess ad ina licenzia tenor Creative Commons (CC0). Cun il standard CC0 eis ei d'ina vart pli difficil d'anflar e da rimnar texts da fontauna, da l'autra vart denton sa mintga utilisader duvrar las datas da lungatg che resulteschan, e quei senza restricziuns ni l'autorisaziun da Mozilla. La finfinala lein nus render l'unitad da datas plurilingua aschi nizeivla sco pusseivel per tuts, inclus perscrutaders, universitads, start-ups, regenzas, organisaziuns socialas e passiunai da computers.
Track progress here and on your stats page.
Ti sas persequitar tiu progress cheu e silla pagina dallas statisticas.
Upload aborted. Do you want to delete your recordings?
Interrut igl upload. Vul ti stizzar tia registraziun?
Carga si ina datoteca cun in maletg
Users validate the accuracy of donated clips, checking that the speaker read the sentence correctly.
Ils utilisaders confirmeschan l'exactadad dallas registraziuns e controlleschan, sch'il plidader ha legiu correctamein la construcziun.
Validating donated clips is equally important to the Common Voice mission. Take a listen and help us create quality open source voice data.
Validar clips gia contribui ei gest aschi impurtont per la missiun da Common Voice. Teidla bein e gida nus a crear datas da vuschs ch'ein open source e da qualitad.
View your progress against personal and project goals.
Veser tiu progress en cumparegliaziun cun las finamiras persunalas e talas dil project.
Voice clips are entered into a submission queue that readies them for listening.
Las registraziuns vegnan transmessas en ina colonna da spetga, nua ch'ellas vegnan preparadas per tedlar.

Voice is natural, voice is human. That’s why we’re excited about creating usable voice technology for our machines. But to create voice systems, developers need an extremely large amount of voice data.

La vusch ei enzatgei natural e human. Perquei essan nus incantai da saver crear tecnologia vocala nizeivla per nossas maschinas. Per crear sistems vocals basegnan ils sviluppaders denton ina sfraccada datas da vuschs.
Voice is natural, voice is human. That’s why we’re fascinated with creating usable voice technology for our machines. But to create voice systems, an extremely large amount of voice data is required.

La vusch ei enzatgei natural e human. Perquei essan nus fascinai da saver crear tecnologia vocala nizeivla per nossas maschinas. Per crear sistems vocals basegna ei denton ina sfraccada datas da vuschs.

Voice recognition technology is revolutionizing the way we interact with machines, but the currently available systems are expensive and proprietary. Common Voice is part of Mozilla’s initiative to make voice recognition technologies better and more accessible for everyone. Common Voice is a massive global database of donated voices that lets anyone quickly and easily train voice-enabled apps in potentially every language.
We're not only collecting voice samples in widely spoken languages but also in those with a smaller population of speakers. Publishing a diverse dataset of voices will empower developers, entrepreneurs, and communities to address this gap themselves. In addition to the Common Voice dataset, we’re also building an open source speech recognition engine called Deep Speech.

La tecnologia da reconuschientscha vocala revoluziunescha la moda e maniera co nus interagin cun maschinas. Ils sistems disponibels actualmein ein denton cars e protegi culs dretgs d'autur. Common Voice fa part dall'iniziativa da Mozilla da render las tecnologias da reconuschientscha vocala meglieras e pli accessiblas a tuts. Common Voice ei ina gronda banca da datas globala cun contribuziuns da vuschs che mintgin sa duvrar per trenar apps che funcziuneschan cun la vusch a moda sperta e sempla, e quei atgnamein en mintga lungatg.
Nus rimnein buca mo registraziuns cun vuschs da lungatgs derasai, mobein era da lungatgs discurri d'ina pli pintga populaziun. Cunquei che nus publichein ina vasta collecziun cun datas da vuschs, han sviluppaders, interprendiders e communitads la pusseivladad da serrar sezs quella largia. Ultra dalla collecziun da Common Voice construin nus era ina maschina da reconuschientscha vocala open source cul num Deep Speech.
VoxForge was set up to collect transcribed speech for use with Free and Open Source Speech Recognition Engines.
Il corpus VoxForge ei vegnius creaus per rimnar transcripziuns da lungatg pil diever liber da maschinas d'identificaziun da lungatg open source.
Want to change your voice clip?
Vul ti midar tiu clip da vusch?

Want to help make Common Voice even better? Great! Get in touch via email or on <discourseLink>Discourse</discourseLink>, submit feedback through <githubLink>GitHub</githubLink>, or join us on <slackLink>Slack</slackLink>.

Vul ti segidar da meglierar Common Voice? Grondius! Contactescha nus via e-mail ni sin <discourseLink>Discourse </discourseLink>, dai in resun a nus sur <githubLink> GitHub</githubLink>, ni viseta nus sin <slackLink>Slack</slackLink>.
Want updates when we release a new version of the Common Voice dataset? Subscribe to our newsletter.
Vul ti vegnir informaus/informada, cura che nus publichein ina nova versiun dall'unitad da datas da Common Voice? S'inscriva per nossa brev electronica.
We are building an open and publicly available dataset of voices that everyone can use to train speech-enabled applications.
Nus creein in'unitad da datas vocalas aviarta ed accessibla publicamein che mintgin sa duvrar per trenar applicaziuns che sustegnan il lungatg discurriu.
We at Mozilla are building a community around voice technology. We would like to stay in touch with updates, new data sources and to hear more about how you're using this data.
Nus da Mozilla creein ina communitad per la tecnologia vocala. Nus lein restar en contact cun tei per parter novitads, novas fontaunas da datas e per intervegnir co ti drovas quellas datas.
We at Mozilla are building a community around voice technology. We would like to stay in touch with updates, new data sources and to hear more about how you're using this data.
Nus da Mozilla essan vid crear ina communitad per tecnologia vocala. Nus lessen restar en contact cun parter novitads, novas fontaunas da datas e cun intervegnir per tgei che ti drovas quellas datas.

We believe that large and publicly available voice datasets foster innovation and healthy commercial competition in machine-learning based speech technology. This is a global effort and we invite everyone to participate. Our aim is to help speech technology be more inclusive, reflecting the diversity of voices from around the world.

Nus essan perschuadi che unitads da datas grondas e publicas promovan l'innovaziun ed ina sauna concurrenza commerciala sil camp da tecnologias da lungatg che sebasan sin maschinas d'emprender. Quei ei in'ambiziun globala e nus envidein tuts da separticipar. Nossa finamira ei che las tecnologias da lungatg daventien pli aviartas e ch'ellas resplendien la diversitad da vuschs digl entir mund.

We believe that large, publicly available voice datasets will foster innovation and healthy commercial competition in machine-learning based speech technology.
Common Voice’s multi-language dataset is already the largest publicly available voice dataset of its kind, but it’s not the only one.
Look to this page as a reference hub for other open source voice datasets and, as Common Voice continues to grow, a home for our release updates.

Nus essan perschuadi ch'ina unitad da datas vocalas publica e da gronda dimensiun promova l'innovaziun ed ina sauna concurrenza commerciala per tecnologias d'emprender a basa dall'identificaziun dalla vusch.
L'unitad da datas plurilinguas da Common Voice ei gia la pli gronda disponibla publicamein, denton buca l'unica.
Considerescha questa pagina sco punct da referenza per autras unitads da datas da lungatg open source. En cass che Common Voice crescha vinavon, anflas ti cheu las pli novas actualisaziuns.
We calculate hours by estimating the average length of each recording, and then multiplying that number by the total number of recordings across all languages.
Nus calculein las uras cun stimar la media dalla lunghezia da mintga registraziun e multiplichein il resultat cul diember total dallas registraziuns en tut ils lungatgs.
We don't have anything to validate in this language, help us fill the queue.
Ei dat aunc neginas registraziuns per valetar en quei lungatg, gida nus ad emplenir la colonna da spetga cun tias registraziuns.
We promise to handle your information with care. Read more in our <privacyLink>Privacy Notice</privacyLink>.
Nus empermettein da tractar tias informaziuns cun quitau. Legia dapli en nossas <privacyLink>directivas davart la protecziun da datas</privacyLink>.
We promise to handle your information with care. Read more in our <privacyLink>Privacy Notice</privacyLink>.
Nus empermettein da tractar tias informaziuns precautamein. Leger dapli en nossas <privacyLink>Informaziuns davart la protecziun da datas</privacyLink>.
We’re building an open source, multi-language dataset of voices that anyone can use to train speech-enabled applications.
Nus creein in'unitad da datas vocalas open source e plurilingua che mintgin sa duvrar per trenar applicaziuns da lungatg.
We’re crowdsourcing an open-source dataset of voices. Donate your voice, validate the accuracy of other people’s clips, make the dataset better for everyone.

Culla participaziun collectiva creein nus in'unitad da datas vocalas open source. Contribuescha cun tia vusch, verifichescha las registraziuns dad autras persunas e meglierescha l'unitad da datas per tuts.
We’re sorry, but your platform is not currently supported.
Nus stein mal, tia plattafuorma vegn actualmein buca sustenida.

We want the Common Voice dataset to reflect the audio quality a speech-to-text engine will hear in the wild, so we’re looking for variety. In addition to a diverse community of speakers, a dataset with varying audio quality will teach the speech-to-text engine to handle various real-world situations, from background talking to car noise. As long as your voice clip is intelligible, it should be good enough for the dataset.

Nus lein che l'unitad da datas da Common Voice resplendi la qualitad d'audio ch'ina maschina d'identificaziun vocala udess ella veta da mintgadi. Grazia ad ina communitad da plidaders multifara ed ad in'unitad da datas cun ina qualitad d'audio multifara empren ina maschina d'identificaziun vocala d'agir en differentas situaziuns dil mund real, naven dil discuors davostier tochen alla canera d'autos. Aschiditg che Vossa registraziun da lungatg ei capeivla, duess ella esser buna avunda per l'unitad da datas.
We will be in touch with more information about how to add your language to Common Voice very soon.
Nus s'annunziein en cuort cun dapli informaziuns co tiu lungatg sa vegnir integraus en Common Voice.
We will be in touch with more information as it becomes available.
Nus restein en contact cun ulteriuras informaziuns, sco che quellas stattan a disposiziun.
We will not make your email public.
Nus vegnin buc a publicar tia adressa dad e-mail.

We will review your request to remove your voice recordings from the dataset. If your request is approved, we will contact those who have downloaded the dataset and request they remove your voice recordings as well.

Nus examinein tia damonda da stizzar tias registraziuns vocalas dall'unitad da datas. Sch'ei vegn dau suatientscha a tia damonda, contactein nus quels che han telecargau l'unitad da datas e supplichein els da medemamein stizzar tias registraziuns vocalas.
What does it mean that I can’t “determine the identity” of speakers in the Common Voice dataset?
Tgei munta quei che jeu sai buca "eruir l'identitad" dil plidader ell'unitad da datas da Common Voice?
What issues are you experiencing with this sentence?
Tgei problems ein dai en egl a ti en quella construcziun?
What level of audio quality is required for a voice clip to be used in the dataset?
Tgei nivel da qualitad d'audio ei necessaria per ch'ina registraziun da lungatg sappi vegnir duvrada ell'unitad da datas?
What’s inside the Common Voice dataset?
Tgei sesanfla ell'unitad da datas da Common Voice?
What’s the difference between Common Voice and Deep Speech?
Tgei ei la differenza denter Common Voice e Deep Speech?
When a user rejects a voice clip it returns to the Queue. If rejected a second time, the voice clip is moved to the Clip Graveyard.
Sch'in utilisader refusescha ina registraziun vocala, tuorna quella ella colonna da spetga. Sch'ella vegn refusada ina secunda gada, vegn ella plazzada sil santeri da registraziuns.
When will you release Common Voice data in other languages?
Cu vegnis vus a publicar datas da Common Voice en auters lungatgs?
When will you release Common Voice data in other languages?
Cura publicheis vus Common Voice en auters lungatgs?
Where does the source text come from?
Danunder deriva il text da fontauna?
Why don’t you ask people to read from books or Wikipedia articles in different languages?
Pertgei supplicheis vus buca persunas da leger cudischs ni artechels da Wikipedia els differents lungatgs?
Why do you need so many different speakers per language?
Daco duvreis vus aschi biars plidaders per lungatg?
Why is 10,000 validated hours the per language goal for capturing audio?
Daco ein 10.000 uras validadas la finamira per registrar mintga lungatg?
Why is Common Voice part of the Mozilla mission?
Pertgei fa Common Voice part dalla missiun da Mozilla?
Why is my language not included yet?
Daco ei miu lungatg aunc buca inclus?
Why should I sign up for an account?
Pertgei duei jeu endrizzar in conto?
Would you like to request your voice recordings be deleted too, or do you prefer to keep them in the Common Voice dataset?
Giavischas ti che las registraziuns da tia vusch vegnien era stizzadas ni prefereschas ti che quellas restien ell'unitad da datas da Common Voice?
Yes, send me emails. I’d like to stay informed about the Common Voice Project.
Gie, tarmettei a mi e-mails. Jeu less star al current davart il project Common Voice.
Yes, send me emails. I'd like to stay informed about the progress of this language on Common Voice.
Gie, tarmettei a mi e-mails. Jeu lessel star sil current davart il progress da quei lungatg sin Common Voice.

Yes, we especially want your voice! Part of the aim of Common Voice is to gather as many different accents as possible so that voice recognition services work equally well for everyone. This means donations from non-native speakers are particularly important.

Gie, nus essan interessai specialmein vid vossa vusch. Ina finamira da Common Voice ei da rimnar aschi biars accents sco pusseivel per ch'ils survetschs d'identificaziun dalla vusch funcziuneschien tuttina bein per tuts. Quei munta che contribuziuns vocalas da persunas ch'ein buca da lungatg matern ein particularmein impurtontas.
You are about to initiate a download of <size>{ $size }GB</size>, proceed?
Il download giavischau cuntegn <size>{ $size }GB</size>. Vul ti cuntinuar?
You are prepared to initiate a download of { $size }
Ti eis promts/promta da telecargar ussa { $size }
You can choose to make your username public or anonymous.
Ti sas decider, sche tiu num d'utilisader duei esser publics ni anonims.
You can help build a diverse, open-source dataset by creating a Common Voice profile and contributing your voice.
Ti sas gidar a crear in'unitad da datas open source varionta cun endrizzar in profil da Common Voice e contribuir tia vusch.
Ti stos lubir igl access al microfon.
Your anonymous voice recordings will remain in the Common Voice dataset. Once you delete your profile you will no longer be able to submit a request to remove your recordings from the dataset

Las registraziuns anonimas da tia vusch restan ell'unitad da datas da Common Voice. Suenter che ti has stizzau tiu profil, sas ti buca pli tschentar la damonda da stizzar tias registraziuns ord l'unitad da datas.
Your avatar now includes a voice clip!
Tiu avatar cuntegn uss in clip da vusch!
Your daily goal has been created
Tia finamira per di ei vegnida creada
You're currently set to <bold>NOT</bold> receive emails such as goal reminders, my progress updates and newsletters about Common Voice
Ti has tscharniu pil mument <bold>NOT</bold> da retscheiver e-mails sco regurdientschas davart las finamiras, novitads davart il progress e newsletters davart Common Voice
You're currently set to receive emails such as goal reminders, my progress updates and newsletters about Common Voice
Ti has tscharniu pil mument da retscheiver e-mails sco regurdientschas davart las finamiras, novitads davart il progress e newsletters davart Common Voice.
Your username and email will not be associated with the published data.
Tiu num d'utilisader e tia adressa dad e-mail vegnan buc ad haver in connex cun las datas publicadas.
Your weekly goal has been created
Tia finamira jamnila ei vegnida creada
You've helped Common Voice reach <goalPercentage></goalPercentage> of our daily { $goalValue } recording goal!
Ti has gidau Common Voice a contonscher <goalPercentage></goalPercentage> da nossa finamira dil di da { $goalValue }!
You've helped Common Voice reach <goalPercentage></goalPercentage> of our daily { $goalValue } validation goal!
Ti has gidau a Common Voice da contonscher <goalPercentage></goalPercentage> da nossa finamira dil di da { $goalValue } !
You've successfully signed up for contributing to { $language }. Thank you.
Ti eis s'annunziaus cun success per contribuir a { $language }. Engraziel fetg.
